 Address (IpAddr ip_addr)
 Set IPv4 address (three byte GSM Header is fix defined!!!).
 Address (UINT8 *data=0, INT len=c_max_len)
 Data consists of a three byte GSM Header and the following IPv4 (4 bytes) resp. IPv6 (16 bytes) address.

 Returns pointer to address data.
